attributes.action: Scrap the idea of universal I.D. cards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They will be a gift to the terorist organisations as their production on demand will be a way of avoiding suspicion; and a gift to identity fraud crooks as they will be able to obtain any persons full details in one insecure location. Within weeks of a factory producing official I.D. cards for the government there will be another producing unofficial cards for the criminal fraternity- see any Hollywood film for confirmation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
